Girls Aloud.translation[0].definitions[0: a British all-girl pop group made up of the winners of the television talent show Popstars: The Rivals in 2002. The members of the group are Cheryl Cole, Nadine Coyle, Sarah Harding, Nicola Roberts, and Kimberley Walsh. Their songs include Sound of the Underground (2002), Biology (2005), and Something Kinda Ooooh(2006).
